channel.title: Compile Error.. Help and i will +rep
channel.description:
"The system cannot find the path specified."
Give me the link to fix it. or just tell me!

item.title: Compile Error.. Help and i will +rep
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

[quote=“Fallen123, post:1, topic:377789”]“The system cannot find the path specified.”

Give me the link to fix it. or just tell me![/quote]I Got The Same Problem But I Know How To Fix It Alittle Thanks To “I Vain I” (Told You I Learn By You Telling Me)
Anyways… Eather One Of Them Are Correct, Go To: Start>My Computer>(C:)>Program Files>Java.
Then Go Up To The Top And Click On The BAR And Press ‘Ctrl + C’ Then Go To Compiler And Paste That, Like This:
C:\Program Files\Java
And You See You Replace That Part With The Compiler Code So It Looks Like This:
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” *.java
What Is Green Is What Your Change, Also Another Problem It Could Be Is Environmental Variables. (Search For A Tut.)

(Rep ++ As You Promised ;))

Read full topic
item.source: Compile Error.. Help and i will +rep

item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

kingman002:

I think its because the java settings in your compiler are wrong.

Reworded: It’s because the path too your jdk folder is wrong.
